summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Mary Kay Makeup Finishing Spray by Skindinävia
Review Date: 2017/06/19
Store: Mary Kay
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Brand': 'Mary Kay', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 2 x 5 inches; 3.21 Ounces'}
Review Text: I loved how this made my makeup look but I don't feel like it made much of difference in longevity. And I am not sure my skin even likes this product because the past few times I have applied it, I would get one or two breakouts. It could be related to something else but the longer I go without this product, the few the problems I have. I prefer the skindinavia lines but don't take my word for it, this product could work for you!

Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------

Review Date: 2017/09/20
Store: Secret
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Secret', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Unit Count': '4.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5.4 x 2.8 x 1.5 inches; 3.21 Ounces'}
Review Text: I have been using this for so long and I like it but I do not know if I will continue to repurchase because I think my body has stopped responding to it. If I was in a pinch and needed something asap, I would go back to this because I know it but currently I am trying other things to see if they compare.
Review Title: ... have been using this for so long and I like it but I do not know if I will ...
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Garnier Fructis Volume Extend Instant Bodifier Dry Shampoo 3.40 oz (Pack of 2)
Review Date: 2018/12/20
Store: Garnier
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Garnier', 'Hair Type': 'Dry', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Item Weight': '0.01 Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '8.2 x 2.7 x 1.8 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '603084294954'}
Review Text: I like this dry shampoo because it feels so light in my hair, it doesn’t feel sticky or tough. I do not feel it gives my hair volume but it does well in cancelling excess oils and smelling good. I would repurchase but I would have preferred more volume (hence my four stars).
Review Title: Good, not perfect for me.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Dr. Denese Cannabis Sativa Super Serum with Soothing Calming Organic Cold-Pressed Hemp Oil, Ginger, Bisabolol, Ceramides - Reduce Look of Wrinkles, Moisturize & Improved Tightness - Cruelty-Free - 2oz
Review Date: 2020/08/05
Store: Dr. Denese
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All, Oily, Sensitive, Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Dr. Denese', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Dr. Denese', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Package Dimensions': '4.6 x 2.6 x 1.7 inches; 2 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Dr. Denese'}
Review Text: After using this for several days now, I am officially in love with this. This serum has calmed my redness by miles, my blemishes don't last a long, and this stuff absorbs lightning fast. It feels so smooth, soft (like velvet), and the texture is thin and easy to work with. There is no smell and a little goes a long way. I definitely plan to keep this serum as a repeat staple in my routine.
Review Title: Very nice
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Zeitun Natural Anti Cellulite Body Scrub - Organic Coffee Body Scrub Exfoliator With Robusta & Dead Sea Salt - Cinnamon, Ginger And Moisturizing Oils, 7 oz
Review Date: 2020/10/15
Store: Zeitun
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 5.91 x 8.27 inches; 7 Ounces'}
Review Text: I like this coffee scrub! The ingredients are simple, yet powerful. It smells like a good, spiced coffee dessert with the cinnamon and ginger. As with any coffee scrub, you have to use this consistently to see any kind of results. I find that this improves my skin softness and shaving is a dream after I use this scrub. Overall a great scrub!
Review Title: Nice
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: SAISZE Jaw Exerciser, Facial Fat Burner Double Chin Reducer Eliminator for Jawline Shaper, Neck Muscle Training Helps Face Slimming for Men Women (Blue)
Review Date: 2020/12/21
Store: SAISZE
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.68 x 4.69 x 1.77 inches; 2.4 Ounces'}
Review Text: I do not think I will continue to use this gadget. For one, like others have said, it is larger than it appears. It is kind of hard to get into my mouth and biting it is not really ergonomic. I followed the directions in the description and boiled it so that when I bit down, the clear bits became an impression of my teeth. However, I did not find that to be much help later on. I used this a couple of times and while I did find my jaw feeling sore afterwards, I do not feel comfortable using it for the long term. My jaw is not in good alignment (something I need surgery for but can't afford) so I got this with hopes that it could help support my jaw and keep it from getting worse. I also have a hard time with jaw discomfort from teeth grinding and my dentist said that exercises can help alleviate that issue. Due to the large size and ill-fit, I fear that it could do more damage to my jaw and bite than help. I think overall this is a lost cause for me but maybe someone else will have better luck.
Review Title: Not really a fan
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Preferences and Patterns Summary:**

- **Makeup & Skin Care**: Prefers products that enhance makeup appearance but is cautious about longevity and skin reactions. Shows a clear preference for specific brands (e.g., Skindinävia, Dr. Denese) that deliver soothing benefits.

- **Hair Care**: Enjoys lightweight dry shampoo but desires volumizing effects—indicates a focus on oil control and pleasant scents rather than volume alone.

- **Body Care & Exfoliation**: Values simple, natural ingredients in body scrubs, finding them beneficial for skin softness. Engages with products that improve overall skin texture and feel, suggesting a preference for holistic beauty routines.

- **Health & Fitness Gadgets**: Experiments with jaw exercise tools but expresses dissatisfaction, indicating they favor ergonomics and comfort in health products. Experiences frustration with ineffective or uncomfortable items, suggesting a critical evaluation of their impact on physical well-being.

- **Product Discontinuation**: Concerns about the effectiveness of long-term use, particularly with deodorants, hinting at a tendency to seek alternatives when products become less effective.

Overall, this individual displays a blend of cautious experimentation and brand loyalty, focusing on effective, soothing, and simple beauty and personal care solutions.

target_interaction.title: It's okay, not my favorite
target_interaction.text: I have oily/combo skin and I am always on the hunt for some good powders. This powder is super finely milled, very soft, and great at setting my face makeup without making it more cakey. Bonus, there is no fragrance whatsoever (you would be surprised how many powders I have come across with a scent). However, this does not extend the longevity of my makeup wear. It did not hold back my oily complexion and it while it did make my skin look soft at the beginning of the day, by the end my skin looked a little more textured than it already does. So, I think for me, this powder is a no-go but someone else may have better luck with it.
target_interaction.title_meta: Loose Face Powder Long Lasting and Waterproof Oil Control Moisturizing Setting Powder Makeup 1.76 Oz
